      • showInAppNotification

        public static void showInAppNotification(android.app.Activity activity,
                                         int messageResId)
        This method is used to show notification to the user in the form of a Toast.
        Parameters:
        activity -
        messageResId - this is the message resource ID (generally present in the strings.xml resource of android) which contains the actual message that needs to shown on the notification

      • isNetworkAvailable

        public static boolean isNetworkAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        This method checks if internet is available when the app is running
        Parameters:
        context - android application context
        Returns:
        return true or false based upon internet availability
